title: Didn't get the veteran reward
body: I only received the Ip to BE and the BE x 6.5, but not the others like the 1 epic skin per four page rune page or the 1.5k BE per page.

replies.body: I didn't get the skins either. the only mission I had was to complete 1 game first win of the day, but I received the ip to be

Hey there, the only mission that this specific account was eligible for was the BE capsule.  It looks like you purchased a rune page bundle on the 9th of September which was past the cut off date -[September 1](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lEF4iRjk-blue-is-the-newip-click-here-for-faq)-.  I can't gurantee that we can make any exceptions here, but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you individually to see if we can find options.  Sorry friend!

Hi. I play the game since 2014 and I think that i should already have received the veteran emote. I might have the neccessary hours played, but I didnt received any mission or emote about that. Can you please check why?
Thanks

Hey, i didnt receive any of my Epic skins gifted from runes pages. I had approximatively 15 pages since season 4 and when i looked in my purchase history, there was only the Victorious graves+chromas and the icon and stuff.
Why i didnt get the missions for 10000 BE ?
Same. I did the mission, but did not receive the icon. I did receive skins and the other rewards I believe.
Hey there, which icon are you referring to exactly?  The veteran reward is an emote.

I just completed the missions I had and got all the rewards except the skins. I've reloaded the client a couple times but still can't find where I received the two epic skins it said I would.  Thanks!
They should show up in the client's purchase history panel.  It looks like you got Arcade Hecarim and Freljord Talyiah.  Grats!
Ah awesome, thanks for the reply. I feel silly for missing it.
I didn't receive my veteran emote. One of my missions said i would receive an emote but once i completed all the missions i got everything except the emote.
nevermind, i just relogged into league twice and finally saw it.
I didn't receive my veteran emote even  though It said I got it?!?!!
they said i got 10,000 BE this morning and have to play a game to get it, I completed the mission but still didnt get no BE.Kinda worried because I didnt get my rewards too
Hi there, i have been playing this game for a couple years now and bought rune pages a long time ago, i played a few games and still not see where i can claim the rune page epic skins. Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=yuon99,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JVzVLvbE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-08T18:54:25.811+0000)
>
> Hi there, i have been playing this game for a couple years now and bought rune pages a long time ago, i played a few games and still not see where i can claim the rune page epic skins. Thanks

Did you buy the rune pages with rp? rune pages bought with IP do not give you skins.

The veteran rewards and rune page skins must be obtained through playing a game, in addition to remainder of Blue Essence via capsules.  Complete a matchmade game to get these missions completed and nab those rewards.
i completed the missions yet still didn't get the emote and yes, one of the missions was for the emote

I looked into this for you and verified that you successfully unlocked the Conqueror of the League.  You should see it in your Emote collections, but might need to restart the client in case of a syncing issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JVzVLvbE,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-08T18:12:48.811+0000)
>
> I looked into this for you and verified that you successfully unlocked the Conqueror of the League.  You should see it in your Emote collections, but might need to restart the client in case of a syncing issue.

hey speaking of skins .... there a golden championship ashe chroma and ward ... you know .. the one that you can get with 320 worlds tokens..sadly due to a series of unfortunate events  which i will not discuss... i only manage to get 35 tokens so far.....and i don't see any information on how to go about getting more since the world tokens will expire by December 4th of this year... is there any way to get more by then? or that  opportunity has now gone out the window due to the worlds tournament officially being over this past week? if so.. total bummer ....seriously riot ...not everyone can keep up with your demands!...
